Date: Monday, 4/28/1989
Subject: Stan Cliburn is sick...
Diagnosis: Sore Back.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 1-2 weeks.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Bob Scanlan
Dear Sir,
Bob Scanlan has an ERA of 3.10 at AA Shreveport Captains!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Bob Zupcic
Dear Sir,

a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/5/1989
Subject: Status of Chuck Carr
Dear Sir,
Chuck Carr isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Shreveport Captains!
He has an AVG of .244, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Stan Cliburn

Dan Schatzeder
